Plot: Inspired by the alarming increase in real-life tragedies involving high school bullying and suicide, Teens Like Phil tells the story of a gay teen, Phil, and his former friend, Adam, who brutally bullies him.
Title: Teens Like Phil
Writer: Dominic Haxton, David Newman (original story), Cherise Pascual
Actors: Adam Donovan, Jake Robbins, Margie Ferris, Bart Shatto
